column7: passed away peacefully surrounded by her children on june 9th
column8: 2015. phyllis was a resident of hollywood and pembroke pines since moving from new york in 1972. phyllis will join her departed husband
column9: thomas marino and is survived by her daughter and son in law
column10: rae and michael salomone; son james marino; son and daughter in law
column11: brian and anita marino; along with her 6 grandchildren amy salomone; thomas marino; michael salomone; ali marino; jamie marino and matthew marino along with 4 great grandchildren. phyllis was the founder of family insurance services in 1981 and has remained active through retirement as the president of pierpointe one condominium. phyllis loved nothing more than to shop and travel and would combine these activities as often as she could. visitation will be held saturday
column13: from 10:00 - 1:00 at the fred hunter's davie funeral home
